alert.note: Alert for Clark; Edgar (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:13AM CDT until June 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northeastern Clark County in east central Illinois... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 613 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marshall, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dennison around 625 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 138 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
